availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Stewart Gibson (Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Gibson and Mary M. Roberts Gibson. Married to Mildred A. Neal Gibson in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on October 4, 1859. Father of Rachel Liby Gibson. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 2, p. 29.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, Christiansburg Precinct.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994054, Shelby County Births.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 18470.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film 000252410.
"William S. Gibson," Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), January 16, 1916, p. 4.
